capabilities.description: WG Easy is able to use raw sockets.
capabilities.name: NET_RAW

capabilities.description: WG Easy is able to load kernel modules.
capabilities.name: SYS_MODULE

capabilities.description: WG Easy is able to perform various network-related operations.
capabilities.name: NET_ADMIN

app_metadata.description: WG-Easy is the easiest way to install & manage WireGuard!
app_metadata.name: wg-easy

run_as_context.description: WG Easy runs as root user.

app_metadata.title: WG Easy

attrs.label: External Host
attrs.description: The public hostname or IP of your VPN server.

attrs.label: External Port
attrs.description:
The port accessible from the clients.</br>
This is ONLY used on the client configuration generation in the "Endpoint" field.

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: When set, requires a password when logging in to the Web UI.

attrs.label: Persistent Keepalive
attrs.description: Value in seconds to keep the "connection" open. If this value is 0, then connections won't be kept alive

attrs.label: Device Name
attrs.description: Ethernet device the wireguard traffic should be forwarded through.

attrs.label: Client MTU
attrs.description: The MTU the clients will use.

attrs.label: Client Default Address Range
attrs.description: The default address range the clients will use.

attrs.label: Client Default DNS
attrs.description: The default DNS the clients will use.

attrs.label: Allowed IPs
attrs.description: Allowed IPs clients will use. If none provided, [0.0.0.0/0,::/0] will be used.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for WG Easy.

attrs.label: WebUI Port
attrs.description: The port for WG Easy WebUI

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description:
Bind to the host network.</br>
It is needed if you want to access services on the host network.

attrs.label: UDP Port
attrs.description: The port for WG Easy UDP

attrs.label: DNS Options
attrs.description: DNS Options for WG Easy.

attrs.label: WG Easy Config Storage
attrs.description: The path to store WG Easy Config.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: Additional Storage
attrs.description: Additional storage for WG Easy.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a volume to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Read Only
attrs.description: Mount the volume as read only.

attrs.label: Mount Path
attrs.description: The path inside the container to mount the storage.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Host Path
attrs.description: The host path to use for storage.

attrs.label: ixVolume Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.label: Dataset Name
attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.label: SMB Configuration
attrs.description: The configuration for the SMB dataset.

attrs.label: Server
attrs.description: The server to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Path
attrs.description: The path to mount the SMB share.

attrs.label: Username
attrs.description: The username to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: The password to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Domain
attrs.description: The domain to use for the SMB share.

attrs.label: Containers
attrs.description: Containers where the label should be applied

attrs.label: CPUs
attrs.description: CPUs limit for WG Easy.

attrs.label: Memory (in MB)
attrs.description: Memory limit for WG Easy.

1.1.12.readme:
WG-Easy

WG-Easy (WireGuard Easy) is the easiest way to install & manage WireGuard!
